title: Love Poem stanzas two and four

content.prompt: The second stanza (lines 5-8) and the fourth stanza (lines 13-16) are similar in that they both

choices.label: present feelings toward the beloved that the speaker rejects at the end of the poem
describe qualities of the speaker’s beloved that compensate for shortcomings discussed in other stanzas
imply that the speaker finds the beloved’s generally negative characteristics useful in some circumstances
suggest that the speaker is envious of the beloved’s attributes discussed in those stanzas

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
